Detailed Description

A class used with xml persolist

XmlPersoListInterface::XmlPersoListInterface (  ) 

Creates a XmlPlayerInterface object

XmlPersoListInterface::getNextID (  ) 

Get the next usable ID

Returns:
The value of the NextId XML node

Get the next ID in string format

Returns:
The value of the NextId XML node

XmlPersoListInterface::increaseId (  ) 

Increase the NextId value by 1

The document is not saved.

XmlPersoListInterface::getAllPlayers (  ) 

Return an array of player xml nodes

Returns:
The Player XML node list

XmlPersoListInterface::getPlayerName ( $  playerNode  ) 

Get the name of a player xml node

The good way to use this function is to get the player xml node first (by a call to getPlayerByName) and call this with the returned player.

Parameters:
$playerNode The Player XML node
Returns:
The player name or "" if the given player does not exist

XmlPersoListInterface::getAllPersos ( $  playerNode  ) 

Get the persos of a player xml node

The good way to use this function is to get the player xml node first (by a call to getPlayerByName) and call this with the returned player.

Parameters:
$playerNode The Player XML node
Returns:
The perso XML node list

XmlPersoListInterface::getPersoId ( $  persoNode  ) 

Get the ID of a perso xml node

The good way to use this function is to get the perso xml node first (by a call to getPersoById) and call this with the returned player.

Parameters:
$persoNode The Perso XML node
Returns:
The ID value

XmlPersoListInterface::getPlayerByName ( $  name  ) 

Get a player by its name

You can test the existance of this player with if ($player)

Parameters:
$name The value of the name tag
Returns:
The player xml node or NULL if the player does not exist.

$  persoId 
)

Get a Perso of a player by its ID

Parameters:

$persoId The perso ID
Returns:
